author: dkulp
msg: Bunch of optimizations for the Aegis XMLTypeCreator to delay creating the XPathUtils and to cache which documents could NOT be found instead of trying to repeatedly find it.

author: gtully
msg: fix up master advisory, advisories are only fired after broker is fully started so the nowMaster advisory needs to ocurr after start rather than as part of persistence adapter start, resolves org.apache.activemq.broker.ft.QueueMasterSlaveTestSupport#testAdvisory failures

author: eric
msg: SieveMailet's post() impl must use destination from supplied url, patch contributed by Eike Kettner (JAMES-1464)

author: pamarcelot
msg: Fix for DIRSERVER-1788 (ConfigurationReader fails to correctly read byte[] values)

author: dennisl
msg: [MCHANGES-302] The REST API is always used when JIRA authentication is configured
